Perceptor:

"It seems that Minions had their own hostage Crisis" Replied Pe=
rceptor "Perhaps we should focus in create a sort of Panic room for her, th=
is place is full of Secrets Rooms, we can conditione one for her... and i h=
ave a perfect quarter for her. Follow me"

Perceptor walked to a Computer a=
nd he typed some commands and a map appeared, it showed a emtpy room close =
to Hydras's quarters and he said "This room has a secrete passaway, that le=
ad a secured room, we can chek the status of the romm and the secure room a=
nd it fits to her she can remain there and hide there; also I can do her si=
gnature invisible for traking devices; that woudl be good enought to keep h=
er safe"

Subject: Re: Recovering Rodimus/BlackFortress


  =

> "i have to swich her signature asap" said Perceptor "and till she's full=
y reporgramed and trained, she cant leave the base; As soon as she is awake=
 I'll start the process... you can train her in some defensive skills. the =
base's security systems are under major reconstruction and this place is bi=
g enough to hide her. What else do you sugest, Rodimus?"

Rodimus shrugged =
as he looked at the door that Nightlight sat behind,
"I don't know. I suppo=
se that will be good enough." He looked back at
Perceptor, "I guess I just =
feel like something big is about to happen,
and it will center on Nightligh=
t."

As they talked Scourge stepped through one of the doors and turned his=

head one way and then the other as if searching for something. He
glanced =
at the door that Nightlight lay resting behind and then at
Perceptor and Ro=
dimus.

With a slight nod of his head for a greeting Scourge turned to walk=

down the hall away from Rodimus and Perceptor, continuing his search
elsew=
here.

Rodimus glanced at Perceptor and then at Scourge's retreating back,
=
"What about the minions that Cyclonus and Scourge say they've left
behind."=
 Rodimus said to Perceptor, "What are they doing while we are
so distracted=
 here with the Maximals?"

(TAG)

Preston
